revision.text: {{talkheader}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Arab world|class=GA|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Greece|class=A |b1 =yes |b2 =yes |b3 =yes |b4 =yes |b5 =yes |importance=Low|topic=history|byzantine-task-force=yes}} {{WikiProject Middle Ages|class=GA|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Military History|class=A|A-Class=pass |B1 =yes |B2 =yes |B3 =yes |B4 =yes |B5 =yes |Muslim=yes|Medieval=yes}} }} {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=20:59, 1 May 2012 |action1link=Talk:Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (782)/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=490188829 |dykdate=2 April 2012 |dykentry=... that during the '''[[Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (782)|Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor]]''' of {{Nowrap|782 CE |action2=WAR |action2date=20:30, 6 July 2012 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (782) |action2result=approved |action2oldid=500109499 }}, [[Byzantine Empire|Byzantine]] general [[Tatzates]] defected to the Arab side when the Byzantines already had the [[Abbassid Caliphate|Abbasids]] surrounded and asking for negotiations? |currentstatus=GA |topic=war }} {{Talk:Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (782)/GA1}} == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:4|one external link|4 external links}} on [[Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (782)]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=742200895 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131109192317/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7895&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7895&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_1 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131109192317/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7895&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7895&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_3 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131109192317/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7895&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7895&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_4 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131109192317/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7895&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7895&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_5 When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.â€”[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 08:06, 2 October 2016 (UTC)
